alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 1:09PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rio Blanco County through 145 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Meeker, or 45 miles southwest of Craig, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meeker. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 33 and 53. Colorado 64 between mile markers 66 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
